Web design

Salon de thé Oasis

Task

"Salon de thé Oasis" is a local tea boutique in the region of Jean-Talon Montréal. This project aims to improve their original website, which was not mobile-friendly and was lack of some dynamic and aesthetic touch.

Other than designing a sleek and neat interface, this modern website also aims to step up the functionality by integrating the CTA of workshop ticket selling.

Areas

#Web design

#UIUX design

#Figma

#Front-end

Design process

  • Research & moodboard
  • Wireframe
  • Styletile
  • Mockup
